title: Help Translate Pokebattler
info: This site is set up to be translated to multiple languages! You can help make the site easier to use for your friends who do not speak English
how: Translating is done using a web tool called Weblate and can be found at
rewards: Special rewards normally only available for Patreon supporters are available for translaters who make a significant contribution. This includes more Pokemon for your Pokebox and higher quality custom simulations.
